name: Seek Girl
description:
Introduction to the game
This is a "collection game" which unlocks "collection" girls by tapping cute little people who jump out of the hole. The unlocked girl will be sealed in a bottle and you can meet her again at any time. Every beautiful girl has her own unique movements and voice to make you have a more authentic experience!
Game features
Leisure Play + Girl Animation + Passionate Voice
Every girl has her own elf guardian in her heart. When you capture his elf, you can get her girl's heart.~
